EmailTemplate.name: 12/9/2014 - New Customer Jumpstart.Follow up - No-shows
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You at VMTurbo Jumpstart
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We were sorry to have missed you at the VMTurbo Jumpstart webcast on December 9th. But hey, things come up, right? The good news is that we are glad to provide you with a recorded version of the training <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/education/blog/2014/05/21/vmturbo-operations-manager-45-jumpstart-training-recorded>. Be aware that you will need to login with (or create <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/create-account.jspa>) your Green Circle Community credentials to view the webcast.
If you have any questions that arise as you view it, please let us know.
We look forward to bringing you more of these types of webinars in the future and would welcome comments and suggestions regarding improvements, via our short survey. <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/F8N6DSX>
In addition to the Jumpstart webinar, we also offer a wide range of additional training options <http://go.vmturbo.com/pso-training-request.html>.
We look forward to seeing you at one of our upcoming events again soon.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
